name: Ghosted (Nix Hydra Games)
description:
The town of Falling Springs is a dreamy slice of small-town Americana: quiet, beautiful, neighborly, quaint. But within the neighborhood lies a secret of supernatural proportions, and its unveiling will bring your love life back from the dead. Literally.

This story can be found by downloading the Fictif app for free, available in the Google Play Store and App Store. Fictif contains multiple visual novel stories to play in various genres. 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fictifgames/
